focus.reason: It is the only active project and currently at 0%, requiring foundational development to initiate progress.

suggested_project.title: Dreams Beneath the Lighthouse
suggested_project.description: A collection exploring recurring motifs of dreams and the symbolic lighthouse, blending subconscious narratives with coastal imagery.
suggested_project.based_on: Recurring themes: dreams (4 pieces), lighthouse (1 piece); both suggest potential for a coherent collection.

decisions: Prioritize foundational work on 'Echoes of the Ocean and Time' to move the project from 0%.
Maintain project work as the dominant mode to reach the 70% project target.
Identify potential for a new collection centered on dreams and lighthouse motifs, to be considered for activation when a new project slot is available.
No active projects are close to completion, so no completion push is required.
